description: This file is a React-like frontend component for a Notes application built with LightningJS. It defines the UI template, state initialization, and methods for interacting with the notes, including creating new notes and selecting existing ones.

classes.name: NotesHome
classes.description: Main LightningJS component representing the Notes Home page, including layout, state, and interaction logic.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles selection of a note by updating the selectedId in the component state.

methods.name: newNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and updates the selectedId to point to the newly created note.

methods.name: enterHover
methods.description: Handles mouse enter event over the new note button to change its appearance.

methods.name: leaveHover
methods.description: Handles mouse leave event over the new note button to reset its appearance.
